name: Message Worker
description:
Submission for Area of Effect Game Jam 2020

Theme: "Message Received"

Game Description:

You are a teacher trapped in the office. Your goal is to help students with math problems. Students are sending you messages with their problems. 

Solve as many problems as you can in two minutes. In one way this game became some sort of educational game. 

Some players will love it, the others will hate it, we guess that is the way it is.

The game is easy to play, just type in the answers on keyboard and press enter.

All graphics were created during the game jam. 

Tools used:

- Unity 2019: https://unity.com/

- Blender: https://www.blender.org/

- Gimp: https://www.gimp.org/

- Inkscape: https://inkscape.org/

- Fonts: https://www.dafont.com/

- Sounds: https://freesound.org/

Credits:
